subtitle:
This dashboard provides analytics for all transactions executed by the Filecoin address, whether leveraging CIDgravity for data onboarding or not. However, some dashboards offer additional insights when CIDgravity is utilized by either the Service Provider (SP) or the client.

Refresh rate: Every epoch
Data freshness: 10 epochs
